entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -1.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 7:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -1.4°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.7°C
Wind: S 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon. Light snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or freezing rain. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to freezing rain mixed with ice pellets overnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow or rain. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 24 December 2022
